name: chatron
description: A chatroom client built with electron, vuejs and socket.io.

scripts.build: electron-packager . Chatron --platform win32 --arch x64 --asar=true --out dist/ --overwrite --prune  --icon=./src/icon.ico --app-bundle-id=robflop --helper-bundle-id=robflop --version-string.CompanyName="robflop" --version-string.ProductName=Chatron --version-string.FileDescription=Chatron --version-string.LegalCopyright="Copyright (C) 2017 robflop" --version-string.InternalName=robflop --version-string.OriginalFilename=Chatron.exe

author: robflop
